Package org.restlet.ext.crypto

Support for cryptography including Amazon S3 and Windows Azure client authentication.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AwsAuthenticator Authenticator supporting the ChallengeScheme.HTTP_AWS_S3 scheme.
CookieAuthenticator Challenge authenticator based on browser cookies.
DigestAuthenticator Authenticator supporting the digest challenge authentication schemes.
DigestUtils Security data manipulation utilities.
DigestVerifier<T extends SecretVerifier> Wrapper verifier that can verify digested secrets.
 

Package org.restlet.ext.crypto Description

Support for cryptography including Amazon S3 and Windows Azure client authentication.

Since:
Restlet 2.0
See Also:
User Guide - Crypto extension
